comment:
>>37733600

You transfer ten credits to have your wielded weapon identified.

"Mm, yes. Blades like these have a long history." They say. "This one has neither artifice, nor Celestial magic about it. However, it is in good condition, and has been very lovingly crafted. It's not often..."

They trail off.

> iron scimitar (masterwork, wielded)

You shrug, passing a few more credits through for a consultation. What harm could it do?

"Ah, yes." They growl deeply, and you can see a row of sharp teeth smile wide behind the darkness of the hood. "Strange, that you would fancy this meeting when our futures are so murky. Dear child, what troubles you so?"

> Ask about the ruins.
> Ask about a player by name.
> Ask about a skill, ability, or archetype by name.
> It seems pretty rigid, but you could try to ask about something else. (Write-in)
name: BSO
